item.title: CVE-2024-2112|2024-04-09T18:58:49.733Z -- 10web -- form%20maker%20by%2010web%20%E2%80%93%20mobile-friendly%20drag%20%26%20drop%20contact%20form%20builder
item.description: The Form Maker by 10Web â€“ Mobile-Friendly Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.15.22 via the signature functionality. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including user signatures.
